usefulItems: rectangular baking dish (32 cm x 20 cm x 5 cm), baking paper, rolling pin, bowl, cling film, silicone mat, refrigerator, oven
title: Apple crumble meringue slice

ingredients.content: 200 g unsalted butter, chilled and cut into pieces, plus extra for greasing
1500 g apples, peeled, cores removed and cut into quarters (approx. 1800 g before preparation)
½ tsp ground cinnamon, plus extra for dusting

preparations.content: Place butter, flour, egg yolks, baking powder, vanilla extract and icing sugar into mixing bowl and mix <b>30 sec/speed 5<b>.

Transfer dough onto a silicone mat or floured work surface and work into a ball. Divide pastry into 2 balls, the first ball weighing 500 g and any remaining dough forming the second. Wrap both balls of pastry in cling film, then place into the refrigerator for 30 minutes to rest.
Preheat oven to 180°C. Grease and line a baking dish (32 x 20 x 5 cm) with baking paper and set aside.

Roll out the first 500 g ball of pastry onto a silicone mat or floured work surface to cover the baking dish. Place pastry into the base of baking dish and prick all over with a fork. Bake pastry for 8 minutes (180°C), then set aside to cool. Clean and dry mixing bowl.
Place ½ of the apples into mixing bowl and chop <b>5 sec/speed 5<b>. Transfer into a bowl and set aside.
Place remaining apples into mixing bowl and chop <b>5 sec/speed 5<b>.

Add reserved chopped apples, cinnamon and sugar and cook <b>20 min/80°C/speed 2<b>. Drain apples through simmering basket and discard juice. Transfer apple mixture into a bowl and set aside. Thoroughly clean and dry mixing bowl.
<b>Insert butterfly whisk.<b> Place egg whites into mixing bowl and whip <b>4 min/37°C/speed 3.5<b>.
With butterfly whisk still in place, mix <b>4 min 30 sec/speed 3<b>, slowly adding icing sugar through hole in mixing bowl lid, 1 spoon at a time, until just combined.
To assemble, transfer apple mixture over cooked pastry base and dust with extra cinnamon.

Top with meringue mixture, spreading evenly over slice. Crumble remaining shortcrust pastry ball into pieces and sprinkle over the top of meringue. Bake for 20-25 minutes (180°C), or until lightly golden brown. Remove from oven and allow to cool completely.
Once cooled, cut into pieces and serve.

hintsAndTricks: Serve Apple crumble meringue slice with vanilla ice cream on the side.
